quote: The most complete believers in faith are those with the best character who are most kind to their families.
Be merciful to those on earth, and the One in the heavens will have mercy on you.
Meeting your brother with a cheerful face is considered a good deed.
True wealth is the richness of the soul, rather than having many possessions.
Truthfulness leads to righteousness, which in turn leads to Paradise.
The best among people are those who are best to their wives, and I am the best of you to my family.
Allah has revealed the importance of being humble towards one another.
Seeking knowledge is an obligation upon every Muslim.
Not thanking people is akin to not thanking Allah.
The people most beloved to Allah are those most beneficial to others.
